mutants.mutated_line: return [word for word in word_count if word_count[word] != 1]
mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def process_string(s):
    s = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', s).lower()
    words = s.split()
    word_count = Counter(words)
    return [word for word in word_count if word_count[word] != 1]

import re
from collections import Counter

def process_string(s):
    s = re.sub('', '', s).lower()
    words = s.split()
    word_count = Counter(words)
    return [word for word in word_count if word_count[word] == 1]

import re
from collections import Counter

def process_string(s):
    s = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', s).lower()
    words = s.split()
    word_count = Counter(words)
    return [word for word in word_count if word_count[word] == 1]

import re
from collections import Counter

def process_string(s):
    s = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', s).lower()
    words = s.split()
    word_count = Counter(words)
    return [word for word in word_count if word_count[word] == -1]
